com.smartgwt.client.docs
Interface GridHeader

public interface GridHeader

Properties and methods related to the ListGrid header. ListGrid headers are implemented as a Toolbar of buttons shown at the top of the ListGrid (one button per column).
The toolbar header provides UI for interacting with the ListGrid fields directly (sorting, resizing, reordering columns, etc).

See Also:
ListGrid.setHeaderHeight(int), ListGrid.setShowHeader(java.lang.Boolean), ListGrid.headerTitleClipped(int), ListGrid.headerHoverHTML(int, java.lang.String), com.smartgwt.client.widgets.grid.ListGrid#headerClick, HeaderDoubleClickEvent, com.smartgwt.client.widgets.grid.ListGrid#displayHeaderContextMenu, ListGrid.getHeaderContextMenuItems(java.lang.Integer), HeaderHoverEvent, ListGrid.getHeader(), ListGrid.getHeaderHeight(), ListGrid.getShowHeader(), ListGrid.getHeaderBarStyle(), ListGrid.getHeaderBackgroundColor(), com.smartgwt.client.widgets.grid.ListGrid#getHeaderButtonConstructor, ListGrid.getHeaderBaseStyle(), ListGrid.getHeaderTitleStyle(), ListGrid.getFrozenHeaderBaseStyle(), ListGrid.getFrozenHeaderTitleStyle(), com.smartgwt.client.widgets.grid.ListGrid#getHeaderButtonDefaults, ListGrid.getHeaderButtonProperties(), ListGrid.getClipHeaderTitles(), com.smartgwt.client.widgets.grid.ListGrid#getSorterConstructor, ListGrid.getSorterButtonTitle(), com.smartgwt.client.widgets.grid.ListGrid#getSorterDefaults, com.smartgwt.client.widgets.grid.ListGrid#getSorterProperties, ListGrid.getShowHeaderContextMenu()
